page.title: 07TRANSPORT IN BAGILT
page.content: The nearest railway station to Bagillt is at Flint.37 passengers trains and 25 freight trains went past Bagillt on Tuesday,9th.July.The railway station in Bagillt closed on February 14th,1966. 71 crosville buses went through Bagillt on Tuesday,9th.July.on the A548 coast road.38 crosville buses went along the A5026 Bagillt/Holywell road. P.O.Lloyd is the nearest local,private bus company.It was formed in 1925.It has 10 double deckers,8 single decker buses.The buses are painted yellow and have red writing.They regularly take children from Bagillt to Flint High, Holywell High,Richard Gwyn(Catholic High school,Flint),Maes Garmon(Welsh medium school,Mold). There are 2 local lorry haulage firms -Corbetts,Waddy's both carrying gravel
